00019 #include <qsettings.h>
00020 #include <qprinter.h>

00023 #include <shlobj.h>

00028 #include "settings.h"
00029 
00030 Settings::Settings()
00031 {
00032     // read settings
00033     QSettings get;
00034     get.setPath("eckroth.net", "GeneralLedger");
00035     get.beginGroup("/GeneralLedger");
00036     
00037 #ifdef Q_OS_WIN32
00038     TCHAR myDocPath[MAX_PATH];
00039     char myDocPath2[MAX_PATH*2];
00040     SHGetFolderPath(NULL, CSIDL_PERSONAL, NULL, 0, myDocPath);
00041     wcstombs(myDocPath2, myDocPath, MAX_PATH * 2);
00042     clientPath = get.readEntry("/paths/clientPath", myDocPath2);
00043     exportPath = get.readEntry("/paths/exportPath", myDocPath2);
00044     importPath = get.readEntry("/paths/importPath", myDocPath2);
00045 #else
00046     QString myHome = std::getenv("HOME");
00047     clientPath = get.readEntry("/paths/clientPath", myHome);
00048     exportPath = get.readEntry("/paths/exportPath", myHome);
00049     importPath = get.readEntry("/paths/importPath", myHome);
00050 #endif
00051 
00052     defaultClientId = get.readEntry("/database/defaultClientId", "");
00053     defaultClientName = get.readEntry("/database/defaultClientName", "");
00054 
00055     defaultWidth = get.readNumEntry("/geometry/width", 700);
00056     defaultHeight = get.readNumEntry("/geometry/height", 500);
00057     defaultX = get.readNumEntry("/geometry/x", 0);
00058     defaultY = get.readNumEntry("/geometry/y", 0);
00059 
00060     printerPrinterName = get.readEntry("/printer/printerName", "");
00061     printerOutputToFile = (bool)get.readNumEntry("/printer/outputToFile", 0);
00062     printerOutputFileName = get.readEntry("/printer/outputFileName", "");
00063     printerPrintProgram = get.readEntry("/printer/printProgram", "");
00064     printerOrientation = (QPrinter::Orientation)get.readNumEntry("/printer/orientation", 0);
00065     printerPageSize = (QPrinter::PageSize)get.readNumEntry("/printer/pageSize", 2);
00066     printerPageOrder = (QPrinter::PageOrder)get.readNumEntry("/printer/pageOrder", 0);
00067     printerColorMode = (QPrinter::ColorMode)get.readNumEntry("/printer/colorMode", 0);
00068     printerPaperSource = (QPrinter::PaperSource)get.readNumEntry("/printer/paperSource", 6);
00069 
00070     PDFPaperSize = get.readNumEntry("/PDF/paperSize", 0);
00071     PDFPaperSizeWidth = get.readEntry("/PDF/paperSizeWidth", "");
00072     PDFPaperSizeHeight = get.readEntry("/PDF/paperSizeHeight", "");
00073     PDFPaperSizeUnits = get.readNumEntry("/PDF/paperSizeUnits", 0);
00074     PDFPassword = get.readNumEntry("/PDF/password", 0);
00075     PDFPermissionsNoPrint = get.readNumEntry("/PDF/permissionsNoPrint", 0);
00076     PDFPermissionsNoModify = get.readNumEntry("/PDF/permissionsNoModify", 0);
00077     PDFPermissionsNoCopy = get.readNumEntry("/PDF/permissionsNoCopy", 0);
00078     PDFPermissionsNoAnnotate = get.readNumEntry("/PDF/permissionsNoAnnotate", 0);
00079 
00080     get.endGroup();
00081     
00082 }
00083 
00084 Settings::~Settings()
00085 {
00086     // write settings
00087     QSettings put;
00088     put.setPath("eckroth.net", "GeneralLedger");
00089     put.beginGroup("/GeneralLedger");
00090 
00091     put.writeEntry("/paths/clientPath", clientPath);
00092     put.writeEntry("/paths/exportPath", exportPath);
00093     put.writeEntry("/paths/importPath", importPath);
00094 
00095     put.writeEntry("/database/defaultClientId", defaultClientId);
00096     put.writeEntry("/database/defaultClientName", defaultClientName);
00097 
00098     put.writeEntry("/geometry/width", defaultWidth);
00099     put.writeEntry("/geometry/height", defaultHeight);
00100     put.writeEntry("/geometry/x", defaultX);
00101     put.writeEntry("/geometry/y", defaultY);
00102 
00103     put.writeEntry("/printer/printerName", printerPrinterName);
00104     put.writeEntry("/printer/outputToFile", (int)printerOutputToFile);
00105     put.writeEntry("/printer/outputFileName", printerOutputFileName);
00106     put.writeEntry("/printer/printProgram", printerPrintProgram);
00107     put.writeEntry("/printer/orientation", (int)printerOrientation);
00108     put.writeEntry("/printer/pageSize", (int)printerPageSize);
00109     put.writeEntry("/printer/pageOrder", (int)printerPageOrder);
00110     put.writeEntry("/printer/colorMode", (int)printerColorMode);
00111     put.writeEntry("/printer/paperSource", (int)printerPaperSource);
00112 
00113     put.writeEntry("/PDF/paperSize", PDFPaperSize);
00114     put.writeEntry("/PDF/paperSizeWidth", PDFPaperSizeWidth);
00115     put.writeEntry("/PDF/paperSizeHeight", PDFPaperSizeHeight);
00116     put.writeEntry("/PDF/paperSizeUnits", PDFPaperSizeUnits);
00117     put.writeEntry("/PDF/password", (int)PDFPassword);
00118     put.writeEntry("/PDF/permissionsNoPrint", (int)PDFPermissionsNoPrint);
00119     put.writeEntry("/PDF/permissionsNoModify", (int)PDFPermissionsNoModify);
00120     put.writeEntry("/PDF/permissionsNoCopy", (int)PDFPermissionsNoCopy);
00121     put.writeEntry("/PDF/permissionsNoAnnotate", (int)PDFPermissionsNoAnnotate);
00122 
00123     put.endGroup();
00124 }
00125 
00126 Settings* Settings::instance()
00127 {
00128     if(settings == 0)
00129         settings = new Settings;
00130     return settings;
00131 }
00132 
00133 void Settings::destroy()
00134 {
00135     if(settings != 0)
00136         delete settings;
00137 }

00324 QString Settings::getPDFPaperSizeString() const
00325 {
00326     if(PDFPaperSize == 0)
00327         return "Letter (8.5 x 11in)";
00328     if(PDFPaperSize == 1)
00329         return "A4 (8.27 x 11.69in)";
00330     if(PDFPaperSize == 2)
00331         return "Universal (8.27 x 11in)";
00332     if(PDFPaperSize == 3)
00333         return "Custom";
00334     else
00335         return "";
00336 }

00391 QString Settings::getPDFPermissionsString() const
00392 {
00393     QString string("");
00394 
00395     if(PDFPermissionsNoPrint)
00396         string += "No-Print";
00397     
00398     if(PDFPermissionsNoModify)
00399     {
00400         if(string != "")
00401             string += ", No-Modify";
00402         else
00403             string += "No-Modify";
00404     }
00405 
00406     if(PDFPermissionsNoCopy)
00407     {
00408         if(string != "")
00409             string += ", No-Copy";
00410         else
00411             string += "No-Copy";
00412     }
00413 
00414     if(PDFPermissionsNoAnnotate)
00415     {
00416         if(string != "")
00417             string += ", No-Annotate";
00418         else
00419             string += "No-Annotate";
00420     }
00421 
00422     if(string == "")
00423         string += "All";
00424 
00425     return string;
00426 }
